channel.title: Please answer this
channel.description: What does everyone think would be a good place for a dungeoneering place on my 317 RSPS (Allstar base)? I will try my hardest to code in Dungeoneering, but I need ideas for a place to make it at. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you don’t need to make your own maps. dungeoneering maps have been released before.

though, there’s no point in hardcoding/shitpacking everything have making your cache so damn large.

Read full topic

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:17, topic:519434”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=637897.msg4299580#msg4299580 date=1368754869]
nowhere. if you want a 600+ skill, use a damn 600+ server and client.
stop hardcoding shit
Thank you for your time.
[/quote]But if you do want to add Dungeoneering, I would recommend actually adding the actual dungeoneering maps to get the best result.[/quote]
Unless you’re a wiz at making your own maps that look awesome, which I have yet to see. But yeah, I agree.

Read full topic

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:20, topic:519434”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=637897.msg4305800#msg4305800 date=1369776806]

I swear hardcoding was implementing something that wasn’t supposed to be in a revision, server sided.

hard coding is a term used throughout all software development, not just rsps

i guess in terms of rsps you would be correct
[/quote]
You’re back?!??[/quote]

I never really left, but I guess

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:13, topic:519434”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=637897.msg4300198#msg4300198 date=1368861950]

nowhere. if you want a 600+ skill, use a damn 600+ server and client.
stop hardcoding shit
Thank you for your time.

What? I don’t believe editing your server files is considered hardcoding… All of those who said that are idiots. Oh, so if I edit my server client class, it’s considered hardcoding? Or if I make my own class, is it then? Please enlighten me to prove me wrong.

if “some people” want it; go ask them. we aren’t your playerbase so you shouldn’t worry about suiting us.

the fact of the matter is, you shouldn’t hardcode higher revision shit. if you want it, use a server+client that has it by default

No server has Dungeoneering by default… It’s coded by people.
[/quote]
Hardcoding is for the people who add the food, armour, and bosses. By default, he meant is integrated with the server (Which is 602).[/quote]
But I still wouldn’t consider it hardcoding. Because it really isn’t because you can use items, monsters, animations, maps, etc. that already exist in say, a 317 (assuming he’s using a PI) to make it fully working.

Read full topic

if “some people” want it; go ask them. we aren’t your playerbase so you shouldn’t worry about suiting us.

the fact of the matter is, you shouldn’t hardcode higher revision shit. if you want it, use a server+client that has it by default

No server has Dungeoneering by default… It’s coded by people.[/quote]
Hardcoding is for the people who add the food, armour, and bosses. By default, he meant is integrated with the server (Which is 602).

Read full topic

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

There’s alot of unused dungeons which you can link together using portals. You can lock the portals untill the players have cleared the dungeon of all the monsters, etc…
Mole Lair, the 4 dungeons from the Desert Treasure quest, ALOT of other quest-related dungeons, etc…
Locate a coords list and warp around, you’ll find a couple places.

Read full topic

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

GodexCAB:

Thank you.

Saying ‘thank you’ really only instigates the problem further.

Now, to stay on topic, I think that using various basements and roofs throughout the game would be something different. Secluded areas could be for bosses, and more spacious areas could be reserved for actual rooms. Perhaps have designated portals that teleport you throughout the different basements around the world?

Read full topic

item.title: Please answer this
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:

if “some people” want it; go ask them. we aren’t your playerbase so you shouldn’t worry about suiting us.

the fact of the matter is, you shouldn’t hardcode higher revision shit. if you want it, use a server+client that has it by default
[/quote]

If you have nothing positive to contribute/say, then don’t post at all please. I’d recommend that people post only if they have a suggestion to make, otherwise they’ll risk an infraction.[/quote]

Thank you.

Read full topic
